" "O sekalay no sera i, 74,340 sq km, no nanom a sekalay i, 1,080 sq km " Polong i 3,705,246 ko tamdaw. sera Masakilac ko sera o malo kakaomahen a sera 30.50 , Malo no kilakilangan a sera 43.60 , malo no roma to a sera 25.90 . siyoto O [[[Panama City]] ko Siyoto. katomirengan no kitakit a romi'ad Pihiratengan no kitakit a romi'ad i sakacecay ko safaw 3 a romi'ad. O Sawara'an no kitakit anini i ci Juan Carlos Varela, patirengan a romi'ad i 2014 a miheca saka 7 folad saka 1 a romi'ad. Pi'arawan to lakaw CIA List of current heads of state and government
